AV.A: access to your local network (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, etc.), can:
AV.L: previously gained access to your machine, can:
AV.P: physical access to your machine, can:

A.L: partialy deny access to your resources/services
A.H: fully deny acccess to your resources/services

S.U: *** all of the above will apply ON THIS APPLICATION ONLY ***
S.C: *** all of the above will apply ON THE ENTIRE MACHINE ***

UI.N: The attack can take place without interaction from any user.
UI.R: The attack can requires a user to take some action (e.g click a link in email).
